Luvisminda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy more stocks, like coffee, laundry soap, milk, eggs, noodles, and snack foods, to sell in her general store.

Luvisminda has been in this business for five years and she sells a variety of items, such as coffee, laundry soap, milk, eggs, noodles, and snack foods. 

In the future, Luvisminda would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stocks, like coffee, laundry soap, milk, eggs, noodles, and snack foods, to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Davron

texts.ru: Даврон трудолюбивый и добрый человек, который живет вместе семьей далеко от центра города в селе, где основным источником дохода населения является скотоводство и земледелие. Даврон женат на прекрасной женщине, которая является домохозяйкой и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Даврон более 26 лет занимается скотоводством. Даврон имеет 3 голов крупно – рогатого скота. Он очень хорошо откармливает скота и поэтому его скот на местном рынке имеет большой спрос. Изучив рынок, он собирается развевать свой бизнес дальше. Для этого ему необходимо еще лучше откармливать свой скот. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки сено для скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Davron is a hard working and kind man who lives with his family in a remote rural area, where the primary way of living is farming and raising livestock. Davron is married to a wonderful woman who is a homemaker and is raising their three children. Davron himself has been raising livestock for more then 26 years. He has three cows. He is very good at fattening cattle and his animals are in great demand at the livestock market. After studying the market needs Davron decide that he wants to further invest in livestock and so must provide his animals with high quality feed. He is requesting a loan of 2000 somoni to purchase hey for the animals. Davron hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy feed for cattle

loans.name: Luz Daris

texts.es: Luz de 24 años de edad se dedica al comercio de artesanías y a la venta de cuadros, en su domicilio ubicado al sur de la ciudad, donde habita con su cónyuge y sus dos hijas en las edades de 3 años y 7 meses. Luz tiene dos años de experiencia en su negocio, la cual aprendió de sus padres, ya que por muchos años se han dedicado a esta actividad, donde también, se ha involucrado su cónyuge, quien abarca los diferentes municipios del departamento del Atlántico y de Bolívar. Sus ventas las realiza a crédito de lunes a sábados y desde las 8 de la mañana, hasta las 6 de la tarde, cuando sale pueblo a pueblo después de haber comprado los productos en el centro de la ciudad. Su meta es ampliar su cartera y aumentar sus ventas, para algún día tener su propia casa, producto de sus esfuerzos y sus ahorros. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará lámparas, cuadros, adornos, relojes de pared, entre otros artículos, que han pedido sus clientes y que son los que mas presentan rotación en el mercadon haciendo que esta inversión sea muy exitosa.
texts.en:
Luz, 24, trades in handcrafted items and sells paintings at her home in the south of the city, where she lives with her partner and two daughters aged 3 and 7 months. Luz has two years of experience in her business, which she learnt from her parents. She has been working in this field for several years and has involved her partner who covers the different areas of the Atlantico region of Bolivar. She makes her sales on credit from Monday to Saturday 8am - 6pm, when she goes from town to town after buying products in the city centre. 

Her goal is to expand her portfolio and raise her sales so that one day she can have her own home as a result of her hard work and savings. She is currently applying for a Kiva Loan, which she will use to buy lamps, paintings, ornaments, clocks and other articles that her customers have ordered and that she sees displayed on the market, which makes this an exciting investment.

loans.use: to buy lamps, paintings, ornaments, clocks and other things

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 49 años de edad, es madre soltera de 4 hijos a quienes crió sola y con mucho esfuerzo, vive en su casa propia junto a su última hija de 16 años ya que los demás son independientes, sin embargo le brindan siempre el apoyo necesario para solventar los gastos de su hogar.Rosa se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles como arroz, azúcar, leche, huevos, aceites, golosinas y algunos productos regionales como plátanos y verduras. Tiene una pequeña tienda que ha establecido en su casa y desde alli atiende a todos sus clientes. Todo lo que ofrece al público lo renueva a diario comprando en el mercado de la ciudad al por mayor, selecciona los productos de las mejores marcas y las verduras mas frescas y saludables. Trabaja sola la mayor parte del tiempo, pero ocasionalmente su hija la ayuda cuando ella tiene que realizar algunas diligencias fuera de casa. Lleva en esta actividad 1 año y le agrada la comodidad y la tranquilidad con la que puede generar sus ingresos económicos en su propio hogar.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 3000 soles y está muy emocionada al saber que hay personas que le brindan un respaldo económico para continuar desarrollando su actividad laboral, así mismo se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.Con el monto solicitado comprará mas productos comestibles como arroz, azúcar, huevos, leche, fideos, verduras y otros.
texts.en: Rosa, 49, is a single mother and has 4 children who she has raised alone.  She and her youngest child, a 16-year old girl, live in a house that they own.  Rosa's other children are grown and living away now, but they often help their mother with household expenses.  Rosa operates a grocery business and sells everyday products like rice, sugar, milk, eggs, cooking oils, snacks, etc.  She operates the business from her house and meets her customers there.  She buys everything she needs for each day from a wholesale market in the city, choosing only the best brands and the freshest produce.  She usually works alone but her daughter fills in at the store when she has to go out from the store.  Rosa has operated the business for a year and says that she is glad to have found a way to earn an income working from her own house.  She is applying for a S/.3000 soles loan and says that she is grateful that people are willing to back her business and give her the opportunity to grow and develop it.  She is committed to repaying the loan on time and says that she will use it to buy rice, sugar, eggs, milk, pasta, vegetables, etc.

loans.use: to stock her grocery business.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en: Myrna, 48 years old and married, is from Pandahan, SND. To make a living, Myrna has owned and managed a general store for 10 years and gets a monthly income of 5,000 PHP. In order to purchase additional stocks like canned goods, bottled products and rice and corn grits, Myrna requests a loan of 10,000 PHP from GDMPC micro credit. She plans to expand her business and use the additional revenue generated from the loan to reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like canned goods, bottled products and rice and corn grits

loans.name: Sergio Sr.

texts.en: Sergio Sr. is a 44-year-old married man who is an entrepreneur with seven children living in Militar, Tukuran. He has been earning from his fishing business for almost five years now with an income of 3,000 PHP a month. To improve his business, he borrowed 5,500 PHP from GDMPC micro credit, which he just joined last year, in order to purchase a new set of fishing nets to be used for fishing. He plans to purchase another fishing boat in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase a new set of fishing nets

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy works hard to support her family. Mary Joy is married and has a pig fattening business in the Philippines.

Mary Joy requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to buy feed, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs.

Mary Joy has been in this business for three years now.

Mary Joy would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Zoir

texts.ru: Зоир молодой и добродушный мужчина в возрасте 32 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Зоир женился рано и поэтому не смог получить образование и  какую-либо профессию. Поэтому сейчас ему приходится заниматься тем делом, которому научил его отец. С детства Зоир помогал своему отцу работать на поле. И сейчас сам Зоир занимается деканством, он выращивает хлопок, а потом продаёт его. Это приносит ему и его семье хороший доход. У него есть своя площадь, которая составляет 1,5га, и на этой земле он выращивает хлопок, а также лук и другую культуру. Жена Зоира также занимается делом, которому научилась с детства у своей матери. Она занимается животноводством, покупает и откармливает скот, а потом продаёт их мясо и молоко. Этот вид бизнеса приносит им в семью дополнительный доход. Сейчас в наличии в семье Зоира есть только 1 рогатый скот, но он хочет, чтобы его жена развивала этот бизнес для того, чтобы иметь стабильный доход в семье. Поэтому они хотят купить ещё несколько скот для откорма и выращивания. Для этого Зоир обратился в Арванд и хочет взять кредит для покупки рогатого скота. Он очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит.
texts.en: Zoir is a young and good-natured 32 year old man. He is married and has three children. Zoir married early and didn't attend college to receive a professional degree. Instead he is making a living with the trade he learned from his father. Since childhood Zoir has helped his father in the fields. Now Zoir has a small farm where he grows cotton for sale. The cotton sales provide him and his family with a good income. Zoir owns a field of 1.5 hectares where he grows not only cotton but also onions and other crops. Zoir's wife also continue the trade she learned from her mother as a child. She raises livestock, and sells them, their meat and their milk at the market. Livestock business provides the family with additional income. Currently Zoir's family owns one cow, but he wants his wife to expand the herd so that the family will have a more stable source of income. That is why they have decided to purchase a few more animals for fattening and resale. Zoir has turned to Arvand for a loan with which he plans to buy more cattle. He hopes for a positive outcome on his loan request and is grateful in advance to everyone who will contribute.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Behruzjon

texts.ru: Бехрузджону 21 год. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Бехрузджон единственный ребенок в семье. Он успешно окончил среднюю школу, и данное время продолжает учебу в университете. Он студент 4 курса Национального Университета Таджикистана. Бехрузджон учится по специальности юриста и имеет большую мечту стать известным юристом. Он учится успешно и является одним из примерных студентов. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор, но его родители не имеют денег в этом году оплатить за учебный договор. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Behruzjon is 21 years old. He is single and lives with his parents. Behruzjon is an only child. He finished high school with good grades and now continues his education at a university. He is a senior and is majoring in law at the National Tajik University. It is Behruzjon's dream to become a lawyer and he is an excellent student, among the best in his class. Behruzjon needs to pay for his tuition but this year his parents do not have enough money to pay the university. Behruzjon is requesting a loan to pay for his college tuition. He hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for his tuition

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 42 años de edad es una mujer buena y muy responsable, esta casada y tiene 7 hijos, vive en su casa propia con todos los miembros de su familia.El trabajo de María consiste en la venta de cosméticos por catálogo, su especialidad son las colonias aromáticas y perfumes aunque también ofrece artículos para el hogar, collares, cremas corporales y faciales, aretes y otros. Periódicamente sale a la calle en busca de sus amigos, vecinos y familiares para vender algunos de sus producto o entregar aquellos que ya han sido solicitados con anticipación. Lleva realizando este trabajo desde hace 1 año aproximadamente y lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da tiempo para poder descansar y estar en su casa haciendo otras actividades.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500 soles por ello agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para que pueda concretar sus planes laborales.Con el monto solicitado comprará más productos para tener en stock como perfumes, talcos y cremas corporales.
texts.en: Maria, 42, is a kind, responsible woman.  She is married with 7 children and they all live together in a house that they own.  Maria operates a cosmetics sales business.  Her specialty is colognes and perfumes, but she also sells creams, jewelry and household articles.  She goes door to door to sell to family, friends and neighbors and also to deliver orders that she received before.  She has operated the business for about a year and likes that she can work when she wants and still have time to do what she has to do at home.  Maria is applying for a S/.500 soles loan and says that she is grateful to you for giving her the chance to take charge of her work hours.  She will use the loan to stock her business with the products she sells: perfumes, powders, creams, etc.

loans.use: to stock her cosmetics sales business.

loans.name: Lais

texts.es: Lais, de 21 años , es una joven emprendedora, aun es soltera pero tiene un hijo de tan solo 1 año de edad y vive en la casa de sus padres.El trabajo de Lais consiste en el alquiler de vehículos de transporte público. Tiene 1 mototaxi que  alquila diariamente a un chofer que acude a su vivienda para solicitar la herramienta de trabajo. Recibe un pago por brindar este servicio y las ganancias que percibe le permiten cubrir las necesidades básicas diarias de su hogar. Algunas veces es alguno de sus hermanos quienes conducen su vehículo. Lleva en esta labor cerca de 1 año ya que necesitaba contar con otra actividad económica para cubrir las necesidades de su pequeño bebé. Eventualmente vende prendas de vestir.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede compartir el tiempo a lado de su familia y dedicarse a la crianza de su bebé, además le agrada poder generar cómodamente los ingresos económicos que necesita para enfrentar el día a día en su vivienda, le va bien hasta ahora, espera poder seguir así para que su flota de vehículos se incremente.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1800, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual.Con el monto solicitado comprará el seguro de su mototaxi y cambiará las llantas traseras.
texts.en:
Lais, 21, is a young entrepreneur.  Although still single, she has a one-year-old son and she lives in her parents’ house.  Lais’ work consists in leasing out public transportation vehicles.  She has a mototaxi that she leases daily to a driver who comes by her house to request his work tool.  She gets paid for providing this service and the profits she earns allow her to cover her home’s basic daily needs.  Sometimes it’s one of her brothers who drives the vehicle.  She’s been in this work for nearly a year because she needed to have another economic activity to cover her baby’s needs.  Occasionally she sells clothes.

What she likes about her work is that she can spend time with her family and devote herself to her baby's care.  Also, she enjoys being able to generate income to face needs day to day at home.  She’s been doing well to date and hopes to continue that way so her fleet of vehicles will increase.

On this occasion, she’ll ask for 1,800 soles and she’s very happy to know that she’ll have financial support because she’ll feel sure of making progress with her business this way.  She commits to make her installment payments punctually.  She will use the requested amount to buy insurance for her mototaxi and to replace the rear tires.

loans.use: to buy tires and insurance for her mototaxi.

loans.name: Mireli

texts.es: Mireli, de 45 años de edad,está casada con Homero con quien tiene 6 hijos sin embargo solo vive con una de ellas la cual tiene 14 años de edad.El trabajo de Mireli comienza muy temprano con la apertura de su tienda. Tiene un establecimiento que ha construido en su casa y ahí ofrece todo tipo de productos comestibles como arroz, panes, sal, azúcar, verduras, té, leche, huevos y otros. Vive en una zona muy concurrida lo cual le permite tener buenas ventas durante el día. También tiene otro puesto de ventas en uno de los principales mercados de la ciudad que lo compró a la asociación de vendedores tras muchos años de ahorro constante, ahí realiza el mismo trabajo tratando muy bien a sus clientes. Se dedica a esta labor desde hace 4 años y trabaja con la ayuda de su esposo.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que esta ligado a las ventas y ella siempre se consideró una buena comerciante, además gracias a la cantidad de clientes que ha conseguido en estos años obtiene muchas ventas y por lo tanto tiene muy buenas ganancias económicas.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/.1000, está muy emocionada al saber que hay personas que le brindan un respaldo económico para continuar desarrollando su actividad laboral, así mismo se compromete a ser una socia puntual y responsable.Con el monto solicitado comprará mas mercadería como verduras, 2 sacos de arroz, aceite en litros y azúcar.
texts.en:
Mireli, 45, is married to Homero with whom she has six children but only one of them who is 14-years-old still lives with her.  Mireli’s work starts very early when she opens her store.  

She has an establishment built at home where she sells all types of foodstuffs like rice, bread, salt, sugar, vegetables, tea, milk, eggs and others.  She lives in a very crowded neighborhood which means good sales throughout the day.  She also has another sales point in one of the city’s main markets that she bought from the merchants association after many years of constant saving.  She does the same kind of work there treating her customers very well.  She’s been in this line of work for four years and works with her husband’s help.  What she likes about this work is that it’s tied to sales and she’s always considered herself to be a good merchant.  In addition, thanks to the number of customers she has managed to secure over the years she sells much and therefore earns good profits.

On this occasion she will request 1,000 soles and she’s very excited to know that there are people who provide economic back-up to continue developing her activity; she also commits to be a very punctual member.  She will use the requested amount to buy more merchandise like vegetables, two sacks of rice, oil in liter containers and sugar.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson of Camanga, Tukar, Zamboanga del Sur is 57 years old and married. He owns farmland where he plants and harvests rice to sell for a living. In 2011, he joined GDMPC micro credit to gain financial access. To pay for the weeding maintenance labor costs and purchase seedlings to raise, he then borrowed 10,000 PHP from GDMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to pay for the weeding maintenance  labor costs and purchase seedlings

loans.name: Shahodat

texts.ru: Шаходат 57-летняя женщина, проживающая в районе Шахритус, в южной части страны. Она вдова с двумя детьми. Шаходат после смерти мужа одна воспитывала сыновей. Сейчас ее сыновья уже взрослые и самостоятельные. Один сын работает учителем в сельской школе, а другой уехал на заработки в Россию. Сама Шаходат намерена заняться торговым бизнесом и уже приобрела торговую точку на рынке района. Шаходат планирует заняться торговлей одежды. Она будет закупать товар оптом с рынка города Душанбе и продавать по розничной цене на рынке своего района. Чтоба начать свой торговый бизнес, Шаходат обратилась за кредитом для закупа товара. Она ждет Вашей поддержки.
texts.en: Shahodat is a 57 year old woman who lives in Shahrituz region in southern Tajikistan. She is a widow and has two children. After her husband died Shahodat raised her two sons on her own. Now her sons are adults and independent. One of them works as a teacher in the village's school and the other one is a migrant worker in Russia. Shahodat is planing to open a retail business and has already purchased a retail stall at the local market. Shahodat plans to sell clothes. So that she can start her business Shahodat has turned to us for a loan which she will use to purchase a batch of clothes. She hopes for your support.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for resale

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, de 29 años, es una mujer joven, amable y carismática, es soltera y madre de dos hijos pequeños, vive en la casa de sus padres a lado de sus menores hijos y su pareja, ella como toda madre quiere lo mejor para sus hijos es por eso que diariamente se esfuerza mucho para salir adelante.El trabajo principal de Carmen consiste en la venta de frutas y verduras regionales. Dependiendo de la temporada ofrece a la venta, plátano, yuca, limones, cocona y otros alimentos de origen animal como pescado seco y carnes de animales silvestres como venado, tortugas, majas y gallinas de chacra. Tiene un puesto de ventas ubicado en un mercado muy concurrido de la ciudad y en el trabaja por las mañanas, mientras que por las tardes o en días lluviosos trabaja en su casa en donde tiene instalado una andamio de exhibición de productos. Realiza esta actividad hace 15 años, lo hace con mayor énfasis cuando en la ciudad se celebra alguna festividad o acontecimiento importante; afortunadamente su trabajo le genera buenos ingresos económicos que le dan tranquilidad emocional.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener contacto con las personas, le da vitalidad y mucha energía para estar en constante actividad física y sobre todo se siente feliz porque puede generar sus propios ingresos económicos .En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500 soles, por ello agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para que pueda concretar sus planes laborales.Con el monto solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de plátano, naranjas y otros productos regionales para continuar trabajando.
texts.en:
Carmen, 29, is a young, friendly and charismatic woman and mother of two young children. She lives with her parents along with her young children and her partner. Like all mothers, she wants the best for her children and she works hard every day in order to succeed. 

Carmen's main work is selling regional fruit and vegetables. Depending on the season, she sells bananas, yucca, lemons, cocona and other foods of animal origin, like dried fish and wild animal meat like deer, tortoises and field hens. She has a stall in a very crowded market in the city and works there in the mornings, in the afternoons and on rainy days she works in her home where she has set up scaffolding to display her products.

She has been doing this job for 15 years, and works particularly hard when there is a festival or important event in the city, luckily her work generates good economic income and gives her emotional peace. Her favourite thing about her job is the customer contact, it gives her vitality and lots of energy to be constantly active and above all she is happy that she can generate her own economic income. On this occasion she is asking for 1500 PEN, and she is grateful for the opportunity that she is being offered so that she can put her working plans into action. With the amount requested, she will buy wholesale bananas, oranges, and other regional products to be able to continue working.

loans.use: to buy regional products like bananas, oranges, mandarins and others.

loans.name: Ángel Orlando

texts.es:
Ángel tiene 18 años de edad, es soltero. Desde la edad de los 4 años su padre le enseño a trabajar en la agricultura. También, estudia y vive junto a sus padres.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 14 bolsas de abono, herbicidas y pesticidas para sembrar 21,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y 112,000 metros cuadrados de maicillo. Con la producción espera tener para el consumo y la otra parte para venderla a buen precio para que obtener ganancias suficientes para comprar vacas lecheras y procesar la lache.
texts.en:
Angel, 18, is single.  He learned farming from his father, starting when he was only 4 years old.  He is still in school and lives with his parents.

Angel is applying for a Fundacion Campo loan that he will use to buy the supplies he needs--14 bags of manure, herbicides and pesticides--to plant 21,000 square meters of maize and 112,000 square meters of maicillo.  He expects to keep part of the crop for food and use the rest to generate a cash income, some of which he will use to buy dairy cows.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his farming business.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Teresita is 47 years old and has two children who are in school.

Teresita has a direct selling business in the Philippines selling Avon products. Teresita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional Avon products to sell to her customers.

Teresita has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional Avon products to sell

loans.name: Evamie

texts.en:
Evamie is 27 years old, married and has one child. She lives in Panduma, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. To earn a living, Evamie has a business selling personal products, and has an income of 5,000 PHP from the business. 

She recently requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase new items, such as cosmetics, clothes and shoes, for sale. She plans to improve her business to offer more products in their community.

loans.use: to purchase new items, such as cosmetics, clothes and shoes, for sale.

loans.name: Hugo Javier

texts.es:
Hugo tiene 25 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene dos hijos. Desde hace cuatro años se dedica a la agricultura y lo aprendió de su familia. Los insumos agrícolas los adquiere en una ciudad que esta a dos horas de su casa, los insumos los traslada en un pick up. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar insumos agrícolas y preparar la tierra para sembrar 112,000 metros cuadrados de yute. Con la inversión espera que su producción sea bastante buena para vender el yute y obtener ingresos económicos que ayuden a los gastos de su familia. Su propósito, es seguir mejorando la casa que recién acaban de construir para que sus hijos vivan cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Hugo’s 25-years-old, has a spouse and two children.  For the last four years he’s been working in agriculture having learned from his family.  He gets the farm supplies he needs in a city that’s two hours away from his house and transports them in a pick-up.

The loan he’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy farm supplies to prepare the soil to plant 112,000 square meters of jute.  With this investment he hopes production will be quite good so he can sell the jute and earn income that will help with family expenses.  His goal is to continue improving the house they’ve just finished building so that their children can live safely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Laudid Esther

texts.es: Laudid de 37 años de edad habita en el sur de la ciudad de Barranquilla, con sus dos hijos en las edades de 12 y 15 años.  Ella genera sus ingresos de su propio negocio de variedades, donde además comercializa calzado y ropa. La rotación de sus productos es muy rápida y muchas veces el surtido no es suficiente para impactar a su clientela, porque vende a crédito y sus cuentas por cobrar no son suficientes para lograr responder la demanda, tanto como es su exigencia. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará ropa infantil, para damas y para caballeros. Su inversión será exitosa pues se fundamenta en su habilidad para interpretar el mercado durante 10 años, en los que durante 12 horas diarias trabaja con el fin de generar ingresos y un mayor bienestar para su familia.
texts.en:
Laudid, 37, lives in the south of the city of Barranquilla with her two children aged 12 and 15. She earns money through her own business, where she sells shoes and clothes. The turnaround on her products is very quick and her stock levels are often not enough for her customers as she sells on credit and her purchasing accounts are insufficient to meet the demand, as demand is so high. 

For this reason, she is requesting a Kiva Loan, the first financing that she will receive from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy clothes for children, ladies and gentlemen. Her investment will be successful as it is based on her ability to interpret the market over the last 10 years, during which she has worked 12 hours a day with the aim of generating income for the improved well being of her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes for children, ladies and gentlemen.

loans.name: José Del Carmen

texts.es: Jose tiene una tienda y a través de ella ha obtenido  dos financiamientos en la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con los que ha logrado aumentar su capital de trabajo  y con ello surtir su negocio y de esa forma poder adquirir mas clientes.  Desde que el empezó a recibir los créditos tiene un excelente surtido, sus cuentas se han incrementado y ha mejorado su calidad de vida porque sus ingresos son mayores. José está muy agradecido porque su negocio tiene más surtido, sus clientes son más y eso es muy bueno para sus ingresos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará mercancía para surtir su negocio como víveres, ranchos, refrescos, pues ya hay productos que han rotado y no cuenta con ellos, en mayor volumen para hacer su exhibición. Teniendo todos los productos aumentará sus ventas haciendo de su credikiva una muy exitosa inversión.
texts.en:
José has a store and by means of it he’s gotten two loans from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo that he’s used to increase working capital to stock the store and be able to win over more customers.  Since he started receiving the loans he’s had an excellent variety of stock.  His accounts have increased and his quality of life has improved because his income is higher. José is very grateful because his store has more stock, his clients are more numerous and that’s very good for his income.  

He’s currently applying for a Kiva loan to buy merchandise like foodstuffs, packaged snacks and soft-drinks in larger amounts to stock his store because there are products that have rotated out and he doesn’t have them.  Having all the products on hand will increase ales which will make his Kiva loan a very successful investment.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es:
Ana María de 54 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora. El arte es su mejor muestra de expresión y su gran pasión. Dedicada a este oficio desde hace trece años, esta mujer ha logrado sacar su familia, brindándoles mejores oportunidades de vida a sus dos hijos. En la actualidad tiene un pequeño taller ubicado en su vivienda en donde elabora pinturas en óleo y manualidades.  
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de pinceles, lacas y pinturas con el fin de mejorar la calidad en sus productos y aumentar sus ventas.
Sueña con tener un gran taller y compartir su conocimiento con las personas de su comunidad.
texts.en: Ana María, 54, is an enterprising woman.  Art is her great passion and her means of expression.  She’s been in this occupation for 13 years.  She’s succeeded in raising her family providing the best life opportunities for her two children.  She currently has a small workshop located at home where she does oil painting and handicrafts.  She’s asking for a loan to buy brushes, lacquers and paint to improve the quality of her products and increase her sales.  She dreams with having a great workshop and to share her knowledge with people in her community.

loans.use: to buy brushes, lacquers and paint.

loans.name: Bienvenida

texts.es:
Bienvenida, de 58 años de edad, se separó de su esposo hace tres años, por lo cual se vio en la necesidad de generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Inició con la venta de productos congelados, lo cual le ha dado un muy buen resultado, fruto de ello, su calidad de vida ha mejorado y las ventas crecen cada día más. Razón que la ha motivado a solicitar un crédito para ampliar su portafolio e iniciar con la venta de productos de la canasta familiar. 
Sueña con tener un gran mercado autoservicio en donde la gente encuentre  los productos que necesita. 
Agradece a Dios por la oportunidad que le brindó de tener su propio negocio y mejorar su condición económica.
texts.en:
Bienvenida, 58, separated from her husband three years ago, so she needed to generate income to support her household.  She started by selling frozen products, which has given her good results: her quality of life has improved and her sales grow more every day.

This has motivated her to request a loan to expand her portfolio and start selling staple goods.

She dreams of having a large self-service market where people will find the products they need.  She's grateful to God for this opportunity to have her own business and improve her economic status.

loans.use: to buy staple goods

loans.name: Saryat's Group

texts.en:
Saryat is a 29-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of four children. Her husband’s salary is not enough to meet the household needs. Therefore, Saryat is running a small business to help her husband to generate some income. 

Saryat purchases new shawls for reselling at a profitable price. She is a very hardworking woman. The variety of shawls she sells is liked by everyone. Currently, her stock of shawls is almost finished. Therefore, she is interested in purchasing a variety of products in different colors for her business. For that purpose, she has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan. This will help her to increase her net income and savings for the future. 

She will use the profit amount for the better education of her children. She is feeling very confident and satisfied after taking this loan because this amount will help her to manage the household expenses and to meet her children's education expenses.

loans.use: to purchase shawls.

loans.name: Amora

texts.en:
Amora is 53 years old and widowed with three children.

Amora works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like spices, laundry soap, cooking oil, coffee, noodles, soft drinks and other groceries for her general store. Amora has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. 

Amora aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like spices, laundry soap, cooking oil, coffee, noodles, soft drinks and other groceries for her general store.

loans.name: Afshan

texts.en:
Afshan is a 37-year-old, hard-working, and diligent woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, along her husband, two daughters, and two sons. Her husband is a government employee, but his income is insufficient to meet the household expenses. Both of her children are studying in government schools. 

Afshan is an efficient beautician, by profession. Since 2004, she has been operating her own beauty salon. Currently, the beauty stock of the salon is almost finished, therefore Afshan wants to purchase cosmetic products to continue her business. 

For that purpose, she has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan, to purchase beauty products, like facial creams, lipsticks, scrubs, makeup kits, hair colors, and some other varieties of products. She would also buy some new chairs for her salon. 

With the profit amount, she will pay the installments of the loan and school fees for her children. She dreams to live a happy, healthy, and peaceful life with her family. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for their support.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Noorjana

texts.en:
Noorjana is a 40-year-old hardworking and diligent woman. She is living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan along with her husband and four children. Her husband is a janitor by profession, and he has a very low monthly income. Because of this, they are facing a lot of financial problems.

Noorjana is a very responsible and skilled woman. She is using her tailoring skills to generate an alternative source of income for her family. She is very experienced in stitching clothes and dresses. She has been doing this work for twenty years. Her clients are very happy and well satisfied with her work. 

She has requested a loan from Kiva’s partner, BRAC Pakistan, to expand her business. She wants to open a tailoring centre in her house. She would purchase two new sewing machines so that her production would be increased. She would also purchase some thread and cloth for stitching purposes. 

Noorjana would pay her installments with the profit amount and also pay some household expenses. She is very hopeful that the loan will be a progressive one for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Olimpia

texts.es:
Olimpia es una mujer joven de tan solo 28 años de edad, luchadora, emprendedora y madre de 2 hijos los cuales están en la primaria en diferentes grados de educación y junto a su esposo viven en un hogar sólido y muy bien constituido. Ella tiene un grado de educación primario completo el cual pudo cursar con mucho sacrificio y mucho esfuerzo gracias al apoyo brindado por sus padres. Su familia completa por muchas generaciones se ha dedicado a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de café y en su generación no es la excepción ya que en la zona donde ella habita es muy apto para cultivarlo y producirlo por su tierra y su clima agradable para el producto. El terreno que ella cultiva lo adquirió por medio de sus padres y ahí mismo pudieron construir su hogar lo cual les permite estar al tanto del de sus cultivos y de su producción.

Hoy en día ella solicita ayuda para dar asistencia y mantenimiento a sus cultivos por medio de la compra de abono, fertilizantes y otros insumos que aseguraran y mejoraran su cultivo y producción de café.

Sus planes so poder seguir aumentando sus cultivos ya que la tierra que sus padres le heredaron son amplias y podría sembrar una mejor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, de esa manera poder generar ingresos para su familia y sus hijos y poder educarlos a nivel universitario.
texts.en:
Olimpia is a hard-working, enterprising young woman who's only 28 years old. She has two children who attend different grades of elementary school. She lives with them and her husband in a solid, very well-established household. She has completed elementary school, which she was able to do through a great deal of effort and sacrifice thanks to the support provided by her parents. For many generations her entire family has worked in farming, specifically growing coffee. Her generation is no exception, since the area where she lives is very suitable for sowing and growing coffee because of its soil and its pleasant weather. The plot of land where she sows was acquired through her parents and there they were able to build their home. This allows them to be on top of things regarding their crops and their produce.

She currently requests help to maintain and take care of her crops by purchasing compost, fertilizer and other supplies that ensure and improve her coffee plants and production.

Her plan is to continue expanding her crop, since the land she inherited from her parents is large and she could grow a wider variety of produce to offer her customers. That way she'll be able to earn profits for her family and her children, and provide them with a college education.

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizer and other supplies for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Khursheed

texts.en:
Khursheed is a 57-year-old woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of six children. 

Her husband is a rickshaw driver, by profession. For the past many days, his rickshaw has not been working properly and he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to repair it, as soon as possible. However, due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. 

Therefore, Khursheed has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan, to help her husband cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. 

With the profit amount, Khursheed wants to purchase a washing machine, for her personal use. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to pay for the maintainance of her husband's rickshaw.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar panel for her home

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es:
Ana, de 28 años de edad, casada, madre de 1 hijo de 4 años de edad. Ella estudia actualmente la carrera de Derecho, vive en Managua. Muy contenta y orgullosa de su logro dice que eligió esta carrera porque es algo que le apasiona desde muy joven y además que le permitirá tener su propia firma de abogados. El estudio para ella significa una puerta hacia la superación y poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Después de graduarse luchara por lograr establecer su propio buffet de leyes donde ponga en práctica todo los conocimientos adquiridos durante la universidad, además le gustaría estudiar otra carrera como psicología.
Está solicitando el financiamiento para pagar su curso de titulación. Así podrá obtener su tan anhelado diploma y ejercer su carrera.
texts.en:
Ana, who is 28 years old, is married and has one four-year-old child. She is currently in law school and living in Managua. She is very happy and proud of her achievement, and says that she chose this field because it has been her passion ever since she was very young and because it will allow her to have her own law firm. For her, an education is a path to self-improvement and to being able to give her family a better quality of life. After she graduates, she plans to work hard to establish her own law firm where she may put into practice all the knowledge acquired in college. She would also like to pursue an additional degree, like Psychology.

She is requesting financing in order to pay for the final course she needs to complete in order to earn her much-desired degree and practice her profession.

loans.use: to pay for the final course she needs to earn her degree.

loans.name: Gustavo De Jesús

texts.es:
Gustavo de 52 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de gorras en el centro de la ciudad, actividad que se ha constituido en la fuente de ingresos para su núcleo familiar. Desde hace siete años creó su propio negocio y hoy desea expandirse con la creación  de una sucursal la cual administrará su hijo de 20 años. Motivo que lo ha impulsado a solicitar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía y estantería. 
Sueña con poder garantizarle a su hijo el acceso a la educación superior y brindarle a su familiar una calidad de vida digna.
texts.en:
Gustavo, 52, makes a living selling caps downtown, a job that has been a source of income for his immediate family.  Seven years ago he created his own business and now he wants to expand by creating a branch run by his 20-year-old son.

This has motivated him to request a loan to invest in buying merchandise and shelving.

He dreams of being able to guarantee a college education for his son and give his family a decent quality of life.

loans.use: to buy caps and shelving

loans.name: Sari Wangi Ternak Group

texts.en:
The remaining five members of the Sari Wangi Ternak Group continue borrowing. Because the other five members had stopped, they chose a new group Board. And they chose Ni Kadek as the new head. 

Seeing their friends being successful, they are motivated to work harder in terms of raising pigs. The current loan will be used to buy superior piglets in order to get maximum results. Ni Kadek and her group members hope this effort will succeed, to be able to support their family and to save for their children's education. 

Their ultimate goal is to continue the business with their own capital.

loans.use: to buy superior piglets to raise.

loans.name: Amna

texts.en:
Amna is 27 years old. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of three children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by trade. For quite some time, his rickshaw has not been working properly because of which he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to repair it as soon as possible. However due to the lack of money he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw.

 Therefore Amna has requested for a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Amna wants to save the profit for paying electricity bills. She is thankful to Kiva.

loans.use: For the maintenance of their rickshaw.

loans.name: Mary Jean

texts.en: Mary Jean is from the village of San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur.  She is 38 years old, married, and has three children.  To make a living, Mary Jean owns and operates a general store.  The main source of income for the business comes from selling daily use products in the local community.  Aside from her general store, they have a rice farm managed by her husband.  In order to purchase fertilizer and to pay for weeding, she borrowed an amount of 20,000 from GDMPC, which she had joined in 2009.  She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and to pay for the labor costs of weed maintenance.

location.town: San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: José Luis de 55 años de edad, se ha caracterizado en su barrio por ser un hombre trabajador. Siempre le a apasionado el mundo de los negocios por lo cual se dedicó al comercio gran parte de su vida. Desde hace dos meses creó su propio negocio dedicado a la venta de alimentos y helados, con el fin de tener una mayor estabilidad y garantizarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido con el fin de acreditar su  negocio y posicionarlo dentro del mercado local.
texts.en: 55-year-old José Luis has been known in his neighborhood to be a hard-working man. He has always been passionate about the business world, which is why he has worked in retail for most of his life. Two months ago he started his own business selling food and ice cream, with the goal of becoming more stable and ensuring better living conditions for his family. He's currently requesting a loan which he'll use to stock up in order to build a reputation for his business and position it within the local market.

loans.use: to purchase beverages, ice cream and snacks.

loans.name: Siti

texts.en:
Siti runs a small stall which sells snacks, drinks, household products, and mobile phone airtime credits. Siti lives in Bogor, a peri-urban area about one hour from Jakarta.  Siti is married and living with four persons in the family home including her sons (eight and one year old).

Siti began working with Ruma 18 months ago because she wanted to increase her family income by running a small stall. She feels really excited to expand her business into selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. For the last three months, she has had around $20 - $35 /day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). As the business runs, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions

loans.name: Sumarti

texts.en:
Sumarti is a private employee, and she also sells mobile phone airtime credits. Sumarti lives in Cibubur, a peri-urban area about one hour from Jakarta.  Sumarti is married and living with five persons in the family home. 

Sumarti began working with Ruma about one year ago because she wanted to increase her family income as well as to expand her networking. She feels really excited to expand her business selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. For the last three months, she has had around $60 - $100 /day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). As the business runs, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is 48 years old and a housewife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a mother of five children. Her husband owns a furniture shop in the market which is the only source of income for the family. Presently he is interested to offer more variety to his customers which will help him to increase his net income and savings as well. However due to the lack of funds, he finds it difficult. 

Therefore his wife Nasreen has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan. So that she can help her husband to purchase wood for manufacturing  doors, tables, chairs and windows. With the profit her husband wants to grow his business in the future, by opening a new shop in the main market. Nasreen is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To purchase wood for manufacturing wooden doors, windows, tables and chairs.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah resides in Nkubu, the Meru region of Eastern Kenya.  This is a very fertile area situated at the slopes of Mt. Kenya.  She is a single mother of two children who has been practicing farming for five years.  Her main source of income is fruit, vegetables, and a retail business.

She requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry.  Venturing into the poultry business will enable her to get more income through the sale of eggs and poultry meat, thus improving her living standards.  In the future, she wants to specialize on dairy farming.

loans.use: to purchase poultry.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 50 years old and married with two children.  She works very hard to provide for them.  Elizabeth runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 20,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell in her general store, such as snack foods, cooking oil, noodles, coffee, cream, and other groceries.

Elizabeth has been in this business for 9 years and sells a variety of items.  In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks for her general store (snack foods, cooking oil, noodles, coffee, cream, etc.).

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is a hardworking and responsible parent.  He is 44 years old and married with two children.  The couple work together in order to earn a living and secure their family's financial needs.  To help him generate income, his wife manages a store that offers agricultural supplies.

Alfred grows rice crops on three hectares of land.  He has been doing this kind of business for 20 years.  He aims to have a stable source of income so that he could educate his two children and support the daily expenditures of his family.  Alfred would like a 50,000 PHP loan to improve his rice crop production and to obtain a better income.  This will allow him to support his three hectares of rice field with the necessary inputs.  These include seedlings, fertilizer, and hired laborers to perform farming activities such as transplanting and tilling the rice farm.  Alfred hopes that his requested loan will be granted, for it will really help his rice farming business.

loans.use: to pay for seedlings, fertilizer, and labor for his rice field.

loans.name: José

texts.es: José de 33 años de edad es padre de 2 hijos en las edades de 5 y 10 años; Con su cónyuge generan ingresos que contribuyen con el bienestar de su hogar mediante su propio negocio, a través del cual elaboran pasabocas como deditos, empanadas entre otros. Su experiencia data de hace tres años cuando un familiar lo introdujo en esta actividad con a que hasta hoy ha sostenido a su familia, primero vendiendo en todo el barrio y hoy en colegios y eventos especiales que tienen las familias. Sus ventas las realiza a crédito y muchas veces de contado, mientras sus compras las realiza con una frecuencia diaria y de contado. José trabaja todos los días desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. En la actualidad está aplicando a un creidkiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará  un congelador y una cilindradora con rodillo de acero. Con ello mejorará su capacidad productiva y sus tiempos laborales, pues cada día su clientela es mayor y si no tecnifica su proceso no podrá atenderlas y generar mas ingresos para su crecimiento personal, familiar y empresarial.
texts.en:
Jose, 33, is the father of 2 children aged 5 and 10. He and his spouse generate an income from their own business that they put towards the upkeep of their home by making treats like biscuits, empanadas, etc. His experience dates back to three years ago when a relative introduced him to this activity, which until today has supported his family, first selling around the neighborhood and today in schools and special family events. Sales are made on credit and often in cash, while they make their purchases in cash on a daily basis. Jose works every day from 8 am to 6 pm. 

He is currently applying for his first loan with Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, to buy a freezer and rolling machine. This will improve their production capacity and labor time, because their clientele gets better each day, and if they don't mechanize their process they will not be able to serve their customers and generate more income for their personal, family and business growth.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and rolling machine

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
Juliana de 24 años de edad, es estudiante, pero debido a su condición económica debe trabajar para pagar su carrera universitaria. Razón por la que inició con la comercialización productos por catálogo entre vecinos y compañeros de la universidad. Con el fin de aumentar sus ingresos, Juliana desea alternar la actividad con la venta de accesorios y ropa, debido a las sugerencias que le han hecho sus clientes, motivo que la ha impulsado a solicitar un crédito. 
Sueña con convertirse en una gran empresaria y tener una cadena de tiendas de ropa. Espera que con dicha inversión mejore la condición económica y la calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Juliana, 24 years old, is a student, but due to her economic situation she has to work to pay for her university degree. This is the reason that she started selling products by catalogue to her neighbours and classmates from university. In order to increase her earnings, Juliana wants to alternate this activity with selling accessories and clothes, because of suggestions that her customers have made to her. It's for this reason that she has decided to ask for a loan.

She dreams of becoming a great businesswoman and having a chain of clothing stores. She hopes that this investment will improve her economic well-being and the quality of life of her household.

loans.use: to buy clothes and accessories.

loans.name: Ma. Luz

texts.en: Ma. Luz is 42 years old and married with five children, three of whom are in school.  She is in the agricultural business, raising hogs in the Philippines for the past 5 years.  Ma. Luz requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.  She has borrowed 7 times in the past, from NWTF, to sustain her business.  Ma. Luz would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta lives in Nkubu, in the Meru region of Eastern Kenya.  This is a very fertile land situated at the slopes of Mt. Kenya.  She is married and has three children.  She has practiced farming for eighteen years and her source of income is maize and beans.

Jacinta requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to construct a zero grazing unit and a water tank.  This will create a good environment for her dairy cows and provide enough water for her crops and livestock.  This will bring in more income because of the increased level of production, thus improving her living standards.  The challenges she faces are unexpected climate changes and poor infrastructure.

In five years’ time, she plans to buy a piece of land.  Jacinta says that Juhudi Kilimo is the most reliable microfinance institution for her.

loans.use: to construct a zero grazing unit and a water tank.

loans.name: Americo Jose

texts.es:
Americo nació en la ciudad de Salvación pero vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú).
Americo tiene 28 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal es la compra y venta de madera. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Él es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora que pertenece al banco comunal “Tesoritos del Manu” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar madera. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Americo was born in the city of Salvación, but he lives in the same city where he was born. (The city of Salvación is located in the Manu district in the province of Manu, in the department of Madre de Dios, Peru.)

Americo is 28 years old and is in a free union relationship from which he has two children. His principal business activity is buying and selling wood. He has worked in this business for a number of years, and it is going very well for him, thanks to the effort that he puts into his work. He is an entrepreneurial and hardworking person who belongs to the communal bank "Tesoritos del Manu" (Little Treasures of the Manu), and at this time he needs a loan to buy wood. He is grateful for and values the loan and promises to make his monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy wood

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Constantino

texts.es:
Constantino nació en el distrito de Paucartambo pero vive en la comunidad de Majopata anexo de la comunidad de Carnicero. (La comunidad de Majopata está ubicada en el distrito del Challabamba en la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú). 

Constantino tiene 34 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de  la cual tiene tres hijos, él es una persona trabajadora que desde muy temprana edad se dedica a la agricultura  y crianza de animales menores como cuyes y chanchos. Desde hace varios pertenece al banco comunal “El Balcon” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como chanchos.
texts.en:
Constantino was born in Paucartambo District but lives in the community of Majopata, an annex of Carnicero community.  (Majopata community is located in Challabamba District in Paucartambo Province within Cusco Department, Perú).

Constantino is 34-years-old and is in a common law relationship; he has three children.  He is a person who started working at a very young age.  He works in agriculture and raising small animals like pigs and guinea pigs.  He’s been a member of the “El Balcón” (The Balcony) communal bank for several years and on this occasion needs the loan to buy small animals like pigs.

loans.use: to buy small farm animals like pigs.

loans.name: Damian

texts.es:
Damian tiene 36 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de  la cual tiene dos hijos, él es una persona trabajadora que desde muy temprana edad se dedica al  engorde de ganado y a la agricultura. Desde hace varios pertenece al banco comunal “El Balcon” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar una torito.

Damian nació en el distrito de Challabamba pero vive en la comunidad de Majopata anexo de la comunidad de Carnicero. (La comunidad de Majopata está ubicada en el distrito del Challabamba en la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Damian is 36 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children.  He is a hardworking person who has been raising livestock and farming from an early age.  For some time, he has been a member of the Communal Bank “El Balcon”.  He is taking this opportunity to request a loan in order to buy a young bull.  

Damian was born in the District of Challabamba, but lives in the community of Majopata, which is next to the community of Carnicero.  The community of Majopata is located in the District of Challabamba in Paucartambo Province, which is in the Department of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy a young bull.

loans.name: Silveria

texts.es:
Doris tiene 41 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de Pilcopata, ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante. Su actividad económica principal es la  venta de comestibles en uno de los mercados principales de la ciudad de Pilcopata. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Chacoq” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar comestibles como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más.  

(La ciudad de Pilcopata es la capital del distrito de Kosñipata dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en: Doris is 41 years old and lives in the city of Pilcopata. She is a hard-working and enterprising individual who is moving forwards. Her main job is selling foodstuffs in one of the main markets in the city of Pilcopata. She has been a member of the “Chacoq” community bank for several years, and on this occasion she requires a loan to buy foodstuffs such as bags of rice, sugar, pasta and other items. The city of Pilcopata is the capital of the district of Kosñipata in the province of Paucartambo in Cusco department, Peru.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs such as bags of rice, sugar, pasta and other items.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: Don pablo vive con su esposa y su hijo en casa de su propiedad y desde hace muchos años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maíz y maicillo con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. El quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas,  pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos y desea superarse haciendo lo mejor que puede en sus cultivos. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Pablo lives in his own home with his wife and son.  For many years he has worked in agriculture, which is his principal source of income.  He grows corn and sorghum.  From this income he is able to cover some of his household expenses.  He wants to buy the supplies he needs such as compost, fertilizer and seeds.  He does not have the financial resources to make this investment, so he has decided to take a loan.  This is the only means by which he will be able to continue raising his crops.

Like all farmers, he puts his faith in agriculture, since they do not have other sources of income.  He wishes to make improvements and do the best he can in raising his crops.  He hopes to obtain an abundant harvest that will enable him to continue to put food on his family's table every day.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer, seeds and other supplies.

loans.name: Felicien

texts.en:
Felicien is a 31-year-old man from the Gicumbi District, in the northern province of Rwanda.  He is seeking a loan of 60,000 RWF to purchase 20 rechargeable LED lights, which he will resell to people in his village who lack electricity.  Every week or so, these customers will return to him to have their lights recharged for just 100 RWF. 

Since starting in December 2012, Felicien he has sold 20 lights to date, providing clean energy to 100 people.  He is also a shopkeeper and will reinvest the money he makes into expanding his other business.  This will help to earn more money for himself, his wife, Marceline, and their 1 child.

loans.use: to pay for 20 low-cost LED lights to resell to rural households without electricity.

loans.name: Fidele

texts.en:
Fidele is a 28-year-old man from the Gicumbi District of northern Rwanda.  He is seeking a loan of 30,000 RWF to purchase 10 rechargeable LED lights, which he will resell to people in his village who lack electricity.  Every week or so, these customers will return to him to have their lights recharged for just 100 RWF. 

Fidele started selling lights in December 2012.  He has sold 30 lights to date, thus providing clean energy to 150 people.  With the money he makes from selling and recharging lights, he will improve his adobe brick home where he lives with his wife, Cesalie, and his 2 children, Azira and Fidela.

loans.use: to pay for 10 low-cost LED lights to resell to rural households without electricity.

loans.name: Basilio

texts.es: El Sr. Basilio tiene 37 años y tiene  3 hijos que son de las edades de  8, 5 y 3  años, el es agricultor, se dedica a la siembra de sandia y frutales en su parcela que se encuentran en la localidad de Pampa el Coscal,  este préstamo es su tercera  secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Basilio va a usar este préstamo para la compra de semillas para la siembra de sandia y  para la posterior cosecha de sus citricos, El Sr. Basilio enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su calidad de vida y va a utilizar los beneficios para aumentar su producción,  El Sr. Basilio vende sus productos en el mercado de la localidad directamente del productor al consumidor, se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta es su única actividad desde hace varios años que le permite mantenerse y mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Basilio’s 37-years-old and has three children who are 8, 5 and 3 years of age.  He’s a farmer who grows watermelons and fruit on his parcel located in Pampa el Coscal.  

This loan is his third sequence in the institution and Basilio will use this loan to buy seeds for growing watermelon and for his subsequent crop of citrus.

The business challenge Basilio faces is to improve his quality of life and he will use profits to increase production.  Basilio sells his products in the local market directly from producer to consumer.  He feels happy and grateful for the opportunity being provided because this is the only activity that for several years has made it possible for him to support himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy watermelon seeds and to harvest citrus

loans.name: Mujeres Al Poder Group

texts.es:
Mujeres al Poder está en su quinto ciclo, ellas están trabajando por salir adelante y por medio de ese trabajo también poder ayudar a sus familias.

Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Celsa, quien por medio de su esfuerzo arduo esta saliendo adelante, ella es una persona muy sacrificada y cuenta que se dedica al reciclaje y venta de productos reciclados, como ser cartones, papel, aluminio y demás. 

Ella recorre en forma ambulante por las calles para recoger los materiales,  y hay veces que los compra para poder revenderlos y tener un mayor margen de ganancias. Ella comenta que está muy  orgullosa de lo que hace, ya que es un trabajo digno y por sobre todo honesto.

Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de cartones, aluminio, plásticos y demás, para poder revenderlos y de esa forma tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando a su familia. Agradece por este gran oportunidad que esta recibiendo, que no muchos dan.
texts.en:
Mujers al Poder (Women for Power) is a group working their fifth cycle. They are working to get ahead in life and also to succeed in helping their families through their jobs.

Celsa is a member of this group. She is progressing in life thanks the strenuous efforts she makes. She is a very self-sacrificing person and she says she engages in recycling and selling recycled products such as cardboard, paper, aluminum and more. 

She goes around the streets of her community to collect these materials, and at times she buys them to then resell them, thus obtaining a better earnings. She says she feels very proud of what she does, as hers is a dignified and above all honest job.

She is requesting a loan to invest it in the purchase of cardboard, aluminum, plastic items and other products to then resell them to get a better income and to keep on helping her family. She is thankful for the great opportunity she is being given, as not many offer this chance.

loans.use: To buy cardboard, aluminum and plastic items.

loans.name: Las Azucenas Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal  “Las Azucenas” es un grupo responsable que han demostrado ser solidarios entre ellos,  la cual está conformada por 09 mujeres trabajadoras. Este es el caso de Delia una joven  de 23 años, casada con 01 hijo dependiente. Hace más de 02 años que Delia cuenta con un pequeño taller de armados de calzados. Este negocio surgió al ver que los ingresos de su esposo no alcanzaban para cubrir algunos  gastos del hogar. Con el el fruto de su esfuerzo a podido comprar su terreno y también implementar su negocio con la compra de 01 máquina de calzados. Con el fin de seguir mejorando solicitó el crédito, pues desea compra  otra máquina de zapato, la cual  le facilitará su trabajo. Su mayor deseo es de terminar de construir su vivienda. Los integrantes del grupo “Las Azucenas” están agradecidos con las personas que hicieron posible este crédito.  Delia se encuentra de pie es la primera del lado derecho,  viste polo negro y  en brazos lleva a su hijo. Bonifacia se encuentra en la parte superior al lado izquierdo, pues no pudo asistir por motivo de trabajo al igual que la señora Julia.
texts.en:
The “Las Azucenas” (Easter Lilies) communal bank is a responsible group that has shown solidarity among them.  It consists of nine, hardworking women.  

Such is Delia’s case, a 23-year-old, married young woman with one dependent child.  For more than two years now Delia has had a small shoe manufacturing shop.  This business arose when it was noted that her husband’s income was insufficient to cover some of the household expenses.  With the fruit of her efforts she was able to buy a piece of land and also to equip her business with the purchase of one shoe-making machine.

Aiming at continuing to improve, she requested the loan because she wants to buy another shoe-making machine that will make her work easier.  Her greatest wish is to finish building her house.

The members of the “Las Azucenas” group are grateful to people who made this loan possible.  Delia is standing first on the right wearing a black shirt and she’s carrying her son in her arms.

Bonifacia is in the upper left because she was unable to attend due to work, as well as Julia.

loans.use: to buy shoe-making machinery.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Por El Progreso Group

texts.es: El grupo “MUJERES UNIDAS PARA EL PROGRESO” está conformada por 10 socios trabajadores y responsables en sus cuotas grupales. Rosa tiene 39 años es casada con 6 hijos aun educando dos de sus hijos estudian carreras universitarias. Rosa es docente dicta clases un colegio particular hace 7años. Años atrás se dedicaba a la venta de comida. En sus tiempos libres prepara comida a pedido de sus clientes. El préstamo lo invertirá en la matricula y pensión universitaria de  de sus hijos. Su mayor deseo es construir su casa y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Rosa se encuentra en la parte posterior del lado derecho viste chompa gris.
texts.en:
The group “Mujeres Unidas Por El Progreso” (Women United for Progress) is made up of 10 hardworking women who are responsible with their group payments.  Rosa is 39 years old and married with 6 children still in school.  Two of her children study at university.  Rosa is a teacher and she has taught in a private school for 7 years.  Years ago she worked selling food.  In her free time she prepares food at the request of her customers.  

She will invest the loan in the university enrollment and boarding of her children.  Her greatest desire is to build her house and give a better quality of life to her children.  The group is grateful to the Kiva investors for the loan.  

Rosa is located in the rear on the right-hand side wearing a gray sweater.

loans.use: to pay for the university enrollment and boarding of her children.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years now.

Margarita requested a loan of 11,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase more stock of products like shampoo, coffee, eggs, soft-drinks, and other groceries to sell in her general store.

In the future, Margarita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of products like shampoo, coffee, eggs, soft-drinks and other groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen de Fátima  está en su ciclo número 1º, ellas se unieron con el propósito de dar a sus familias lo que no tuvieron ellas, todas se ayudan por salir adelante organizando actividades de manera grupal e independiente en sus actividades que se basa en el macate y artesanías.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Domitila, quien es la presidenta del grupo, ella cuenta que tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante y que se esfuerza por dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan. Ella se dedica a las artesanías y también a la venta ambulante de productos de todo tipo, como ser prendas, calzados artículos de bazar y demás. Ella trabaja todos los días, haga frío o calor, para poder seguir creciendo y así ser un ejemplo para su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de calzados y prendas, para poder seguir con sus ventas y de esa forma tener los ingresos que necesitan.
texts.en:
Virgen de Fátima (Virgin of Fátima) is a group working their first cycle. They got together to offer their families what they could not have, and the all help each other out to progress by organizing both individual and group activities with their jobs, all related to “macate” (traveling merchant) and handicrafts.
Domitila is a member of this group, and she is also its president. She says she has a great desire to progress in life, and that she makes efforts to provide her family with everything they need. She engages in handicrafts, and she is also a street vendor selling every kind of products, such as clothes, shoes, general items and more. She works every day, when it’s cold as well as when it’s hot, in order to keep on progressing and thus being an example for her family.
She is requesting a loan to buy shoes and clothes, in order to continue selling her products and earning the income that they need.

loans.use: To buy clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Virgen De Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen de las Mercedes está en su ciclo número uno del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas están  haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para conocer su situación, donde dos integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, con ingresos muy bajos.
Liliana es una de las miembros, ella se dedica a la venta de comestibles de todo tipo y cuenta que gracias a que es muy hábil está saliendo adelante y se gana mayor clientela. Es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que trabaja por crecer y ayudar a su familia.
Ella solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus comestibles, como ser verduras, condimentos, carnes y demás, y así seguir invirtiendo en su microemprendimiento.
texts.en:
The group called Virgen de las Mercedes is in its first cycle with the program for groups of women, in which all are participating in the study to eliminate poverty in order to better understand their situation. Two of the members live below the poverty line, with very low income.

Liliana is one of the members. She makes a living selling food of all types and says that her skills have enabled her to forge ahead and win more customers. She is a very hardworking and enterprising person, who works to grow and support her family. 

She requests this loan to buy supplies so she can continue preparing food, such as vegetables, condiments, meat and other ingredients, and thus continue investing in her microenterprise.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, meat and other products to continue preparing food for sale

loans.name: Sotero

texts.es:
El Señor Sotero, está casado con la Sra. Marciana, tienen cinco hijos, por quienes ambos se esfuerzan al máximo para poder darles todo lo que necesitan y sigan creciendo.
Don Sotero trabaja como macatero (Vendedor ambulante) vendiendo sus productos, como ser hamacas, sobrecamas, colchas de puerta en puerta hace mas de 20 años.
Su dedicación al rubro fue ya que dejaba muy buenas ganancias  para poder mantener a su familia y ayudarlos. El es una persona muy trabajadora y que lucha por salir adelante.
Solicitó el préstamo para la compra de frazadas, hamacas y lo que tenga que ver con el negocio en general ya que cuenta con muchos pedidos porque trabaja con otros macateros de la zona que le llevan a vender sus productos en varios puntos del país.
texts.en: Sotero is married to Marciana.  They have five children and they try their best to be able to give them everything they need to continue to grow.  Sotero works as a “macatero” (street vendor) selling products such as hammocks, bedspreads, and quilts door-to-door.  He has been engaged in this activity for over twenty years.
